project.name: EeeZorBot API
project.description: EeeZorBot API: a node IRC bot library

classitems.description: Install a hook on the server.

params.name: hook
params.description: Hook to install (can be named or RegExp)

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback to run when the hook fires

params.name: once
params.description: Should this hook uninstall itself when it is run?

classitems.name: off

params.name: callback
params.description: callback used in the hook you want to remove

params.description: Callback to run when command invoked

params.description: Name of the event to trigger

params.description: What the event callbacks should use for the 'this' keyword
